question: [File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [Integration] [Ordering guarantee] Does TryBufferedX maintain ordering guarantees when error futures complete, or can errors cause ordering violations in backup data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [Integration] [Backpressure] Can FuturesOrderedX cause backpressure issues if queued_outputs grows unboundedly while waiting for ordering, stalling backup operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [Integration] [Ordering loss] Can FuturesUnorderedX be mistakenly used where ordering is required, causing blockchain state backup corruption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [Memory safety] [Pin guarantees] Does pin_project on BufferedX properly enforce pin guarantees, or can self-referential structures cause use-after-free during backup stream processing? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [Memory safety] [Pin projection] Can the pin_project macro generate unsafe code that violates pin guarantees when polling futures during backup operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [Memory safety] [Unpin bound] Does the Unpin implementation allow moving pinned data causing memory safety violations in backup stream processing? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [Memory safety] [VecDeque reallocation] Can VecDeque reallocation during growth cause dangling pointers if futures hold references to queued data? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [Panic safety] [Unwind behavior] If a future panics during polling, does it properly unwind or can it leave BufferedX in inconsistent state corrupting backup operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [Panic safety] [Error conversion] Can into_future() panic on certain error types, leaving TryBufferedX in inconsistent state during backup error handling? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [Panic safety] [BinaryHeap panic] Can BinaryHeap operations panic due to ordering violations, corrupting queued_outputs and losing backup data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [Panic safety] [FuturesUnordered panic] If FuturesUnordered panics, can it leave in_progress in inconsistent state causing data loss in backup streams? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [Async] [Waker handling] Does poll_next() properly register wakers, or can missed wakeups cause backup streams to stall permanently? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [Async] [Context propagation] Can the Context be invalidated between polls causing spurious Poll::Pending returns in backup operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [Async] [Poll exhaustion] Can repeated polling without yielding cause CPU starvation affecting validator performance during backups? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [Async] [Concurrent polling] Can multiple concurrent poll_next() calls cause race conditions in VecDeque access, corrupting backup data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [Async] [Executor dependency] Does BufferedX make assumptions about executor behavior that could break on different async runtimes during backup operations? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [Async] [Task cancellation] If the backup task is cancelled, does TryBufferedX properly clean up in-progress futures or can resources leak? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [Async] [Nested polling] Can nested poll_next_unpin() calls cause reentrancy issues or stack overflow during deep backup pipelines? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [Async] [poll_next_unpin safety] Does poll_next_unpin() on FuturesUnordered properly handle concurrent modifications during backup processing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [DoS] [Memory exhaustion] Can an attacker trigger backup operations with massive buffer sizes causing OOM and validator node crashes? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [DoS] [CPU exhaustion] Can error-producing streams cause TryBufferedX to spin in error handling loops, exhausting CPU during backup operations? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_ordered_x.rs] [DoS] [Heap growth] Can queued_outputs BinaryHeap grow unboundedly if ordering is never satisfied, causing memory exhaustion during backups? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/futures_unordered_x.rs] [DoS] [Queue flooding] Can an attacker flood the queued VecDeque with futures faster than they can be processed, causing OOM in backup operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/buffered_x.rs] [DoS] [Future accumulation] Can slow-completing futures accumulate in in_progress_queue indefinitely, exhausting memory during long backup operations? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/utils/stream/try_buffered_x.rs] [DoS] [Error accumulation] Can error futures that don't complete accumulate in in_progress_queue, causing memory leaks during backup error scenarios? (Medium)
